title: Stationside
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lunch restaurant in historic King Plow Arts Center in West Midtown. Uses local ingredients when possible. Menu consists of sandwiches, sides, and salads. Has vegetarian including a smoked tofu BLT, chickpea burger, kale chips, quinoa salad, tempura avocado. Vegans need to specify no cheese/yogurt. Atmosphere is influenced by the history of the train station, which gives it a rustic appearance. Free Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: 887 W Marietta St NW Studio D
